1.content:
Jon sighed and adjusted his tie for the hundredth time that night. He could of taken the job at McDonalds, but no. He had to be suckered in by the help wanted ad looking for someone to greet and show customers to their tables. He should have been alerted that something was wrong, when he read the description of the restaurant in the ad. He should have been tipped off that something was amiss when the restaurant described itself as, ‘a refined café, offering other worldly customers the most unique meal of their lives’. But Jon had just shrugged it off and taken the job without any idea of the ‘other worldly customers’ or ‘unique meal’ that they offered.

Jon looked around him at the customers and shuddered. It was so weird seeing animated and fictional characters sitting down and eating other characters, and it was only made weirder by the choices each person was making for their meals.

Just last night, Speedracer had walked through the door and ordered the Gilmore girls for lunch. Seeing the badly animated character, gorge himself on the screaming TV characters made Jon feel very unnerved. It was even worse inside the private booths. Once he had checked one of the booths when he heard screaming. Screaming wasn’t uncommon in the Café because most meals did a lot of crying while they were being eaten and digested. What stood out about the scream was that Jon recognized it as one of the customers. Without think, he opened the private booth and looked in. What he saw Snow White, Cinderella and Alice doing to a shrunken Inu-yasha would haunt him till the day he died. Who would of thought that Disney girls could be so wild? He would never again be able to watch a Disney movie the same way again. In the private booths, most meals ended up inside the customers, just sometimes not through the mouth.

Another thing that had Jon bugged was that the hungry patrons never questioned why they were at the café or why they were so eager to eat other living-breathing people. Jon got to the entrance of the café by walking down a long alley a few blocks from his home, but he has overheard customers say the route to the café was different. Some said they found the entrance in the forest, others in the middle of the desert. It was never consistent with anyone.

But perhaps the most distressing thing about Ravénous Café for Jon was that no one seemed to remember the café twice. People that he’d spoken to previous times would come in and have no idea who he was. He hadn’t been working at there long, but he expected to be remembered once. The most damning evidence that no one remembered the café twice, was that he’d seen people he served before, be served as a meal while screaming with no idea where they were. It seemed most likely that whenever someone left the restaurant via the door or digestion, they lost all memory of the Ravénous Café.

Jon straitened up when he saw two customers get up and head for his way. He put on his phoniest smile and spoke his rehearsed line. “Come back anytime to the Ravénous Café. Where we serve you in more ways as one.” The two customers laughed and left the café. Idly, Jon wondered if the next time he saw them, would they be the ones being served up as meals?

“What a nice couple. They even offered a tip, but I turned them down. We don’t charge customers any money, so why should they tip me.” Jon turned and gave a real smile to the only sane person he’d met since starting this job. Never mind that the person was really a bunny girl, who carried people out of the kitchen to be eaten alive, all the while smiling brightly. Her name was Bunny and she was the server to every customer that walked in through the door.

“I wouldn’t call them a nice couple. That was Lust and Gluttony from the anime series Fullmetal Alchemist, they are evil real pieces of work.”

Bunny stared at Jon blankly and he sighed at seeing the confused look on her face. Like the characters that walked in through the door, Bunny had no idea that they were from fictional series. He’d tried to explain it to the anthro-bunny, but she had just smiled blankly and said she understood, but of coarse, she didn’t. Jon had given up trying to explain, figuring that Bunny wasn’t capable of understanding the strangeness of their customers or their job.

“Whatever Jon,” Bunny responded with her big toothy grin. “I think table three is ready to order so I better get over there. By the way, I think you have a customer waiting behind you.”

Jon nodded dully and watched the beautiful bunny girl strut over to table three. He closed his eyes and took a deep breath, working up his resolve to turn around and face another bizarre character that should technically not exist. He put on his phony smile and turned to the customer.

“Welcome to the Ravénous Café, the only place where everyone’s on the menu. I’m Jon and I’ll be showing you to your seats.”
1.title: Welcome to the Ravénous Café

11111.content:
Jon blinked several times at the young pubescent boy that had walked into the café. He looked fairly normal, save for the whisker like marks on his cheeks and unusual clothes. Honestly, wearing bright orange, did this kid have any fashion sense? His blond hair waved around as he looked up and down the restaurant. Confused about where he was and how he got there. One thing he did know though, he was hungry and for once, Naruto didn’t think Ramen would cut it.

“Hey Mister,” Naruto spoke up, grabbing Jon’s attention. “Any chance I could get a table? I feel like I could eat someone as big as Choji.” Naruto didn’t notice that he had just referred to another person as a meal, which wasn’t too much of a surprise. Once someone entered the café, the concept that eating another person was wrong went out the window. People were food and no matter how much they cried and pleaded, nothing changed that.

“Certainly, follow me to your table,” Jon said respectfully and led Naruto through the restaurant to an empty table. Naruto took his seat and Jon handed him his menu. With his job done, Jon left, giving Naruto an opportunity to look over his menu with a ravenous eye. Naruto had never felt anything like desire before; he left that up to his sensei Jiraiya. But at that moment, Naruto desired every single person he saw on the menu. From the prettiest girl, to the handsomest man, none weren’t craved by the young ninja. He wanted them all, but not in the conventional sense. He wanted to taste them, feel them fill up his belly, and then digest their beautiful bodies.

Naruto felt exultant and the only thing putting him down was the fact that he could only have so many before he was full. If he could, Naruto wished he had the endless hunger of Choji, so he could eat all the gorgeous people in front of him. But he wasn’t Choji and he couldn’t eat every single person on the menu, therefore Naruto had to only select the very best to eat.

“Are you ready to order,” The sweet voice broke Naruto’s concentration and he looked up at the smiling face of the Ravénous Café’s only waitress, Bunny. She was eagerly waiting to take his order and bring the blond boy his first serving of flesh.

“I think I’ll have him,” Naruto said quickly, pointing to a boy in a military uniform. Then he thought about it again and quickly decided on another person. “I mean her!” Naruto cried, now pointing to a redheaded pigtailed girl wearing a Chinese shirt. Then another picture caught his eye. “Maybe her,” Naruto said, not with so much certainty. He was pointing to a woman in purple tights.

Seeing the trouble the customer was having, Bunny made a helpful suggestion. “Why not close your eyes and randomly point to someone.”
Naruto nodded his head slowly, it was the best solution. If he didn’t get a meal soon, he was going to gobble up the waitress and then who would bring him seconds? Closing his eyes and taking a deep breath, Naruto randomly pointed at the menu selecting who he was going to eat.

“’Nami’ from One Piece,” Bunny read out from the menu. The orange haired pirate girl was pictured on the menu, smiling brightly and carrying a long pole. She had long legs and an ample bosom, not something Naruto usually noticed but those things would be in his belly, so he cared this time. Pausing to think, Naruto struggled to decide if he wanted Nami as his meal.
11111.title: Naruto can't pick

Naruto ignores whatever Nami is saying and eats her
111111.content:
“Bring her to me, I’m starved!” Naruto said, no longer caring who he ate. All that mattered to him was getting someone inside him as quickly as possible. Bunny nodded and rushed to the kitchen, not bothering to even ask if Naruto wanted Nami shrunken or taken to a private room. She had a hungry patron to feed.

Naruto was left at the table, holding his stomach and thinking hard about his meal. He knew that morally it had to be wrong to eat someone alive, but right now, he could care less. His hunger needed to be sated and he’d deal with the moral ramifications later. Besides, he was a ninja, killing people was what he did. So what if this person would be dyeing inside of him instead of with a blade in their necks. A death was a death, no matter how you did it.

Soon, out of the kitchen came Bunny. Balancing a huge covered plate on one hand, she walked over to Naruto, who looked like he was going to explode. His meal had come and he could barely contain his excitement. Soon he’d be dining on a delicious girl, he could hardly wait.

The plate was placed on his table and the cover was removed. Naruto stared strait into scared and confused eyes of Nami. She wore a white shirt, with blue strips all over and a tiny orange mini-skirt that barely covered her long legs. She was kneeling on the plate, unsure of how she’d ended up on the platter.

“Hey kid, where am I?” Nami asked, looking at Naruto curiously. The kid looked like he was ready to go ballistic. His eyes were wild a bit of drool was running down his chin.

“I’ll tell you were you’re going, into my belly,” Naruto chuckled.
Nami looked at Naruto like he was crazy. “What the hell are you talking about?”

“I’m going to eat you up good,” Naruto simply said and lounged at the unsuspecting pirate. Nami didn’t even have time to flinch, with Naruto training in speed and his maddening hunger, he had grabbed Nami around the waist. Naruto pulled the girl closer and opened his mouth wide. Nami gasped as his gapping maw stretched out to impossible proportions. Realizing she was in trouble, Nami tried to think of a way out of her current predicament.

“Wait, wait, wait,” Nami begged, trying to come up with a way to get her away from the hungry ninja. She needed to think fast, or she was going to end up being eaten by an overly spirited ninja boy.
111111.title: Naruto's spunky pirate meal

1111112.content:
“How about I pay you?” Nami said and smiled nervously. Naruto took no notice of Nami’s final words; he had grown too hungry and needed to have the orange haired beauty inside him to satisfy his craving. Naruto opened his mouth and began feeding. His lips slide down across her hair, descending slowly over her forehead as he pushed down. Her ears bent down against his lips and then snapped back into place inside his mouth when he pushed Nami a little further in. Naruto’s lower lip was against her eyebrows for only a moment, and Naruto's lips passed her eyes and ears, leaving her blind. Nami involuntarily closed her eyes as the sound around her was immediately muffled by the wet sounds inside Naruto's mouth.

Nami’s last cry of help was cut off when Naruto pushed the rest of her head into his mouth. Naruto's lips wrapped around Nami’s neck like a collar, holding tightly as Naruto sucked more of Nami in. Paused for a moment to prepare him for his first swallow, Naruto took a few deep breaths before swallowing. Nami felt her whole body trembling as she felt Naruto adjust his grip around her waist, and slide his lips around her shoulders. His teeth barely grazed her as he slid Nami between his gapping jaws. Nami had been trying to grab anything to stop her drop into Naruto, but this stopped as Naruto took Nami further in, pinning both her arms to her sides.

Nami felt his lips glide across her nipples, pushing down her large breasts as they slid into his maw. Her head was now halfway down Naruto's throat and she felt his throat muscles constricting and relaxing around her. The contractions of his esophagus pulled her gently but firmly inward. Naruto was now halfway down Nami’s body and he felt like he was in heaven. She tasted so sweet he thought he could cry.

His lips were now around her waist and he slid his hands down her legs and took a firm grip of them. He needed a little extra push to get her hips through his mouth, so he roughly shoved the girl in. Nami yelped as her buttocks graved Naruto’s sharp canines before joining her in Naruto’s wide mouth. From this point, completing the swallowing process was easy for Naruto. Moment by moment, more of Nami entered him. Her thighs passed into his mouth and then his lips were around her knees.

Only below Nami’s knees did she not feel the warm, wet pressure of Naruto's throat and mouth all around her. Only her calves and feet were not in the warm grip of Naruto's body. The rest of Nami’s legs glided into Naruto's mouth. Now Naruto didn’t even have to push anymore. The swallowing movements of his throat muscles were doing all the work pulling her inside with ease. His lips were around her ankles now. Her sandaled feet hung from his lips, were they twitched as the girl connected to them was covered by the insides of another person. Naruto idly removed the sandals and put them down on the ground beside him. They would make good mementoes of his meal.

Then, with a light slurp, they were inside his jaws and he closed his mouth. He closed his eyes and concentrated, relaxing his throat and swallowing deeply, he felt his whole meal empty into his stomach, which bloated out as more of Nami filled it. His shirt was pushed up by his huge stomach, which shuddered as the person inside it kicked and punched the walls around her in a hapless attempt to escape. Naruto chuckled at the wasted attempts to escape. He sighed and patted his belly, feeling the movements slowly fade as the person inside fell unconscious. Looking towards the menu, Naruto took a moment to decide whether he could really stomach another meal.

11122211.content:
"Welcome to Ravénous Café, the only pla-"

"WIND SCAR!!!"

Before Jon could greet the first person to enter through the door, a huge lightning-like tornado came storming through the door and toward his direction!
"AAHH!!" out of instinct, Jon jumped out of the way BARELY able to escape the blast that ripped through the café. The empty seats and tables in a 50 foot radius behind him wasnt so lucky... and yet the fellow customers simply turned their heads as if it was nothing!

While Jon was questioning in his mind why exactly no one else actually cared that they were almost split in half, he listening to hard heavy breathing about a couple inches away from his face...

He turned to his to see angry yellow eyes staring into his soul! "WHOA!" Jon jumped back and got a good look of his next potential customer. A bruised and battered man with yellowish eyes, long white hair with cute little dog-ears sticking out the top, wearing a big red Gi clothes with parachute pants meaning that he's either of the Far East... or a big MC Hammer fan!
Hey, that's Inuyasha... wait, aint he dead? I mean those Disney girls did things to him that would even make Jeffery Dahmer wanna puke!

"How did you-"
"DONT ASK!!" the angry dog-boy roared at Jon! Chances are it might not have been an easy escape, what with the scars across his body, cuts across his face, fingernails sticking out his back, blood leaking out his mouth, and a couple of hairs falling off his head. Whatever happened to him, must have been 'A Whole New World'... of Hurt!
Although Inuyasha didnt say anything, Jon knew what was on his mind. And that was revenge. But revenge on who?! He couldnt kill Jon, it's not HIS fault! He only greets the customers... kill the bunny-girl! SHE took the order!

Just then, the dog-boy showed sudden interest in this place. He looked on the menu and seen various names all across at exceptionally low prices.
"Wait a second... I heard things about this place. Is it true that ANYONE can be on the menu?" he asked Jon.
"That's right," Jon nodded, "Anyone."

"Anyone, eh??" Inuyasha raised his eyebrow in intrigue as a devious smirk appeared on his face. Fearing the worst, Jon corrected himself, "OH! Uh... that is... anyone... except for employees! They are off limits because... you know, they serve the food!"
Actually, that's not true! NO ONE is off limits. Not even the mysterious Management... but godforbid whoever has the balls to order him/her!

Luckily, Inuyasha allready had his lunch planned out in his head. "In that case.. I want every damn Disney girl you got in this damn café! And I want 'em all shrunk, so I can do EXACTLY what they did to me!" then he lowered his head and whispered, "except for a few certain things..."
Jon gritted his teeth when he heard that! Oh man, of all the things the hungry half-demon would wanna eat..

"Uh.. sorry man!" Jon shivered a little as he explained, "But just last night we had a special 'all you can eat' on Disney girls. And apparently, some white-haired freak with a moon on his forehead ate the last one we had.. I think his name is Sessho-" he immediately stopped in mid-sentence because he remembered the certain relationship between the two customers, "-Jerry."

Inuyasha groaned in disappointment, "Ughh.. so there's NONE left?" Jon thought for a bit... maybe, JUST maybe the café mightve held out on one or two just in case of emergencies! Like THIS one!

"You know, I think we might have one left in the back somewhere. I'll have to check."

"Make it quick!" dog-boy demanded.
11122211.title: P.O.D. (Pissed Off Dog!)

111222111.content:
Jon scampered away from Inu-yasha. He kept looking back at the half-demon, afraid that he was going to get up and blow him in half. Usually violent customers never make it into the restaurant, something to do with the positive juju vibes management put in. Well, whatever was keeping the violent customers out wasn’t working tonight. Jon looked behind him one more time, thus causing him to miss Bunny walking in front of him carrying a huge tray. He hit the bunny girl from behind and fell back onto his behind. Bunny remained upright and even managed to not drop the jumbo tray.

“Hi Jon, where’d you come from?” Bunny chirped, acting like she had just noticed him. Her tray shook and Jon heard swearing underneath from the very unhappy meal that was about to be served.

“Bunny, we got a very hungry customer that will cut off my ear if I don’t bring him a shrunken Disney girl, please tell me we have one left.” Bunny tapped her chin and thought about it. Jon was on his hands and knees, beginning for a good answer from the dim waitress. He looked at Inu-yasha and saw he was sharpening up his butter knife with the tessaiga, turning the once dull blade into a weapon made for laceration.

“I got it!” Bunny cried out. Jon lit up like a Christmas tree; his furry angle had pulled him through. “That ear cutting thing was a reference to the movie ‘Reservoir Dogs’, right?”

“What?!” Jon screamed, unable to comprehend what Bunny was talking about. “Bunny have you gone crazy?”

“Crazy, like the guy from ‘Fight Club’, who had multiple personalities?” Bunny giggled girlishly. Jon was sweating bullets now, he could hear the sound of teeth mashing together from Inu-yasha. He needed to get one of those animated girls or he was going to have a six-foot blade scratch his prostate.

“Please Bunny, you got to help me, you’re my only hope!” Jon latched to her leg and started crying his eyes out. At the same time that he was weeping like a girl, Jon was slowly crawling behind the furry waitress, if Inu-yasha attacked, he could use her as a human/bunny shield.

“I know this one! I know it!” Bunny hyperventilated and waved her hand around like an overexcited child. “Princess Leia from the first 'Star Wars' movie said that. Did I get it?”

“If I say yes, will you help me keep from being ripped in two by Cujo?”

Bunny nodded quickly and Jon said, “Yes.”

“Yippee!” Bunny exclaimed and started jumping up and down. The top of the platter she was carrying fell over and Jon saw the meal/person that Bunny had been carrying. Hog-tied and naked was the reincarnation of Kikyo, the junior high girl with the miko powers and the furry enthusiast, Kagome. Jon’s eyes shot open and he fought down a scream. If Inu-yasha saw the girl he was crushing on in this position, he was a dead man. Turning around, and half expecting to see Inu-yasha coming towards him with his giant sword, Jon saw that Inu-yasha’s attention was focused on brooding. He hadn’t seen Kagome, yet. Sighing with relief, Jon turned back to Bunny and handed her the fallen top to the tray.

“Whoever ordered this, make sure they take her to a private booth, away from…” Jon checked over his shoulder again, “…prying eyes.”

“Rightieo Jon,” Bunny did with a mock salute. “Thanks again for getting me that DVD player and all those movies for Christmas from Best Buy. I’m finally able to understand all those pop culture references you use.” Jon’s right eye started to twitch. Next year, he’s getting her a coupon for Macys.

“By the way, here’s the last Disney girl. She was ordered by this guy named Tsume, but you can have her if you really want.” Bunny reached into her pocket and took out a tiny human girl. The shrunken girl was tossed into the air towards Jon, her hands and legs flailing around as she flew through the air. Jon caught her and stared down at the tiny human being. He recognized which Disney girl he was looking at immediately.

“Bummer,” Tommy, aka the original Green Ranger, said after learning his favorite restaurant was all out of the Family Matter cast.

“Yah, sorry. About an hour, ago Sabrina the teenage witch ordered our last member, Urkal. On the bright side, she said he tasted stringy. You probably wouldn’t have liked him.” Jon looked at his feet, dejected about being unable to get his favorite star his favorite meal. Maybe he could find something on the menu that the martial artist would enjoy just as much? Jon thumbed through the menu, trying to find someone that would satisfy the Power Ranger.

“How about Jack Sparrow from Pirates of the Caribbean?” Jon suggested quickly, pointing to the scraggily face of the world’s greatest pirate.
“Too salty, all that sea air ruins the taste,” Tommy groaned. He had been really hopping to have his desired meal and it really bummed him out that they were all out. How could he get into his Zord unless he got his favorite meal?

“What about Motoko from Love Hina? She’ll fill you up and her fighting spirit might rub off on you.” Tommy shook his head; he wasn’t in the mood for Japanese. He needed some good old fashion American star to eat or he wouldn’t be able to work properly. Jon sighed, he couldn’t think of anyone else that Tommy could eat, he’d suggested his favorites, but all of them had been turned down. He was about to suggest that maybe Tommy should come back later when they may have some new Family Matter characters on the menu, when Bunny walked up to the table.

“Having trouble ordering?” the friendly waitress smiled and got simultaneous nods from Tommy and Jon.

“Well do I have a surprise for you. We just got a new dish in and she’s a dozy. She hasn’t been put on the menu yet, but I’ll let you order her because I can tell you’re really hungry.” Tommy looked at Bunny interested, he hadn’t been able to find anyone he wanted on the menu, but maybe this new dish was what he was looking for.

“Who is she?” Tommy asked.

“Her name is Kelly Bundy from Married with Children and when I told her she was going to be eaten, she got really excited.” Tommy nodded, intrigued by this new meal they were offering. Jon on the other hand was flabbergasted.

“Kelly Bundy?! The Kelly Bundy?! Damn, I used to watch her all the time on the TV in my room, with the door locked, while in bed, and with some lotion and tissues.” Bunny and Tommy looked at Jon for a second, both with mutual looks of curiosity. Jon grew flustered and tried to make himself small, he should of left out that last part.

“Yep, she sure is pretty and smart too.” Jon rolled his eyes at Bunny’s comment. The bunny waitress was slow on the uptake. She was the only person Jon knew that could say they once had a pet rock die because they forgot to feed it. Jon forgot about the dumb comment and looked at Tommy. Would he order Kelly and if so, was their any chance Jon could get her autograph before she was digested?

Jon and Keiichi stared up at Urd’s giant face with awe. She truly looked like a Goddess to the two shrunken men. As they stared at her, she stared at them. Urd lifted her hand up to her waiting lips and in one smooth movement, tipping her hand forward sending Keiichi tumbled towards her mouth. Keiichi was flung forward, passing over her boulder like teeth and landing on her soft, wet tongue. Urd felt the featherlike sensation of her meal landing on her tongue and slowly closed her mouth trapping Keiichi in darkness. Jon watched from Urd’s plate as she pushed the tiny man around her mouth. He heard her let out soft moans at her meals taste and close her eyes several times to savior Keiichi’s taste. He knew that Keiichi was being overpowered by Urd’s tongue like he was a grape in her mouth. Being covered in her transparent saliva as he was moistened for his trip down her throat. Urd had the power to make a human being disappear forever. One swift swallow and when she opened her mouth it would be empty. Eventually, Urd ether grew bored with her foreplay or remembered that she was hungry. Whatever the reason, the conclusion was the same, time to swallow. He did however feel the front of Urd’s tongue pushed up toward the roof of her mouth as the back dropped in one smooth ripple that forced Keiichi back towards the throat. Keiichi looked behind his shoulder and saw Urd’s gullet opening and taking him in whole. Slippery soft tissue closed around him, squeezing him downwards towards the stomach. Outside of the stomach, Urd rubbed her stomach and licked her lips. That had been one of the greatest meals that she has had in a long time. She then remembered that her meal wasn’t over and she looked at her plate where her second course was watching on.

“You ready for your turn?” Urd asked sultrily. If one mortal was good, another was going to be great. Jon looked up, with an unreadable expression on his face.

Jon sat down beside Keiichi as they waited to be judged. The giant receptionist for anime heaven was on the phone talking to ‘God’. Jon could hear the scratchy voice of the anime God coming from the phone and Jon couldn’t be sure, but he’d bet he’d heard that voice before, which wouldn’t surprise him. Since starting work at the Ravénous Café, he’d seen some funny customers, and if one of them had been the anime God, then he wouldn’t be shocked at all. Although, now that Jon thought about it only a cruel female God would allow so much fan service that gives guys a look at huge boobs and crotch shots, but never let you see the good underneath. Truly, any God that would hide such glory behind flimsy clothes was one to be feared and abhorred.

“Do you have any idea why we’re going to either anime hell or heaven?” Keiichi asked, still unaware that he was only a Japanese cartoon.

“Beats me,” Jon grunts. He lacked both the energy and interest in explaining to Keiichi about his origins. If he told the simple man that he was created to be the poor sap in an anime, where he’s surrounded by beautiful women but never gets any. Jon figured that if ignorance was bliss, he shouldn’t enlighten his friend.

“Ya, got it. I’ll make sure to send the next anime character to you so you can use him as a guinea pig. No, I won’t have my way with them before you. Okay, bye-bye.” The heavenly receptionist puts down the phone and Jon and Keiichi look up at her with restlessness. Surely you both weren’t going to hell, Jon thought. He know from the anime that Keiichi was a nice guy and unless masturbating to anime characters was a sin, Jon wasn’t heading to hell either. The giantess put on a big smile and glanced down at the two recently departed mortals that were waiting for judgment. “I got great news.”

“We’re going to anime heaven!” Jon and Keiichi both shouted and started hugging one another. They had been worried they were both going to anime hell, but it looked like that wasn’t going to happen. Oh happy day!

“Nope, you’re both going to hell for being virgins. I don’t understand it myself, but her mighty Godness thinks that unless a man has some experience in the sack, he shouldn’t be allowed to go to heaven.” Jon and Keiichi let go, gaping at the giantess in shock and horror. This couldn’t be happening, it just couldn’t be!

“What’s the good news,” Jon said in a daze, vaguely remembering the giantess saying something about good news.

“I just saved a bundle on car insurance,” the giantess chuckled. “Now bye-bye. Say hi to Hitler and the guys that edited Escaflowne.” With a sweep of her hand, both of the recently deceased were flung off her desk. With a final scream, Jon plummeted into a world of flames.
“NOOOOOOOO!”

Into the Ravénous Café walked a tall Asian woman with short black hair. She was wearing sweats, which on her shapely body didn’t seem make her that bad looking. Jon recognized her as Videl, the teenage girlfriend of Gohan from Dragonball Z series. She looked weary, but also excited to be here. Jon could tell right away that he had a very hungry customer here, who wasn’t going to be leaving until they either ran out of meals or her belly buckled. He stepped up to her to formally greet her.

“Welcome, may I take you to your table?” Jon gave Videl a bow because he knew she was from an oriental world, where such things were commonplace. Videl smiled at the courteous gesture.

“Actually, could you get me a towel first. I just came from training and I’m a little sweaty,” Videl replied with a slight blush. She had wanted to clean up before eating, but her hunger had won out and she’d decided to go eat before showering. Jon nodded to her request and walked quickly to the bathroom to pick up a towel for the waiting customer. He weaved past tables, avoiding bloated customers with wiggling bellies. He moved out of the way in time to miss Bunny, who was carrying a huge covered tray holding God who knows who. He reached the bathroom and found a neatly stacked pile of towels near the sink. Often there were messes when eating live people, so towels were kept in the bathroom for the messes too big for napkins. Taking one from the top, Jon rushed out of the bathroom and back to Videl. She gratefully took the towel from him and swabbed her forehead of sweat.

“What service,” Videl commended. “I think there’s a special tip in store for you.”

Blushing like a schoolgirl, Jon looked at his feet embarrassedly. He had only been doing his job of keeping the customers happy. Maybe he had done more then what was expected of him, but he didn’t mind. After all, the last thing he wanted to do was get on the bad side of someone that could eat him.

“Would you like to be taken to your table?” Jon humbly asked.

“Of coarse,” Videl answered cheerfully. She was still hungry and needed a nice meal to fill her belly. Jon took her to her table, passing the customers he’d speeded by a moment ago. Once they’d gotten to their table, Videl sat down and was handed a menu. Jon started to leave, but Videl quickly stopped him.

“I need your opinion. My boyfriend…er… I mean sensei,” Videl corrected herself. Thee was no reason for Jon to know she was attached, yet. “He eats tons and gets really strong and fights really well. I know on occasion him and his family eats here and orders a blend of different people. I was told that the gender of the meal sometimes determines the calories and fat. What gender would you suggest I order from if I want to gain muscles?” Jon thought about it. He’d heard something about different genders have different affects on the body once they’re digested. 12311.content:
When Tifa Lockhart walking into the restaurant, her eyes went from Jon to the rest of the place. Her wardrobe consisted of a mini-skirt and tight white top that together hugged her features tightly. Her long brown hair swayed behind her, breaking into two curls of hair at the end. She was absently rubbing her stomach and licking her lips, two signs that the young lady from Nibelheim was feeling the hunger for another human being.

“May I take you to your table?” Jon asked politely. He saw the uncertain look in Tifa eyes and knew that he was going to have to lead her gradually to a table until she got her wits about her. He took a step forward, looking behind him to see if Tifa was following. Tifa snapped to attention when Jon started moving and looked at the young man like she was seeing him for the first time. A small smile formed on her lips and she closely followed Jon to her seat. She couldn’t explain why or how, but she wanted to eat someone, preferably a boy, but she’d settle for a girl if need be. It seemed like an insane idea, but since Tifa walking into the café, it was all she could think about. Somehow, she knew she could eat someone and digest him or her, but she didn’t know how. She decided to stop focusing on it and instead look forward to what was a head of her, a yummy boy to eat.

Tifa was taken to her table in the middle of the restaurant and sat down. Jon left her alone with a menu he’d taken from the entrance and Tifa eagerly opened it up and started trying to decide whom she was going to eat.

“Look at all the boys,” she giggled, trailing her finger over one of their pictures. “They look so cute. Of coarse they aren’t as cute as my Cloud, but who is?” Tifa chuckled and imagined what it would be like if Cloud was dining with her. She’d order a hunk and he’d have that annoying brat Aerith. It would be perfect; they could have a romantic dinner, while Aerith was slowly digestion inside him.

“It could only get better if he was the meal,” Tifa said to herself, imagining Cloud inside her stomach. She shivered in delight at the prospect of that happening. Tifa returned her eyes to the menu, trying to see if maybe, just maybe, her beloved Cloud was one of the set of choices.
12311.title: Head in the Clouds

123112.content:
Tifa saw a few blonde-haired people; most were busty women that although looking appetizing, weren’t her darling Cloud. Groaning, Tifa put down the menu and sulked, she wasn’t going to get to eat Cloud. Her brooding lasted for a few seconds; and then she pickled the menu up again and started scanning the pictures, looking for the cutest and most appetizing boy on the menu.

“I might not be able to eat my Cloud, but I can still eat a cute boy.” She cackled, getting a few odd stares from some other patrons. Tifa could feel her pulse quicken and her mind go a buzz as she fantasized over all her choices of different men she could eat. Some were mere boys, only twelve or thirteen, while others were in their teens. They ranged from buff to skinny, short to tall, tanned to pale. She wanted them all, but knew that her stomach could only hold so many. She needed to pick a good one to start off on, a warm up.

She might not have her Cloud to dine with or on, but she was going to stuff her face with as many boys as she could handle. To begin with, Tifa decided to eat someone young and small. Not too burly, but without any baby fat. It was as she was looking that Bunny came to her table, to see if her new customer was ready to order.

“Do you know what you want?” The bunny girl asked curiously, letting one ear flop down, while she looked at Tifa questioningly.

“Naw, I can’t make my mind up on a boy. They all look so yummy and filling, I don’t know where to start,” Tifa relying, not looking up from the menu. Bunny remained silence as Tifa reviewed the menu one more time. This time her eyes settled on one boy near the end. He looked kind of normal, but his vivid blue eyes reminded Tifa of Clouds. His name was Shinji Ikari and it read beside his name that he was from Neon Genesis Evangelion. Strange name for a country, Tifa thought as she looked between the picture and her stomach. Did she want Shinji inside her belly?

Jon was absolutely certain; the curvy female in front of him was Aisha Clan Clan from Outlaw Star. Her long cat ears poked out from both sides of her head, while her tail waved lazily behind her. She might have looked relaxed, but Jon could tell that she was on the hunt. How much of a hunt she was going to get Jon wasn’t sure. It was hard to imagine having the prey carried to your table as very sportsmanly.
Aisha raised her nose to the air and sniffed around her. This wasn’t an uncommon thing for the more furrier customers of the Ravénous Café.

“Meow, I smell so many yummy terrans in the kitchen and some other creatures that I can’t quiet place.” Aisha sounded unsure of herself. She could detect the scent of human, but something else, something exotic.

“We have a wide assortment of humans, aliens, antros, were-creatures, robots, lizard men and I think we may have a few heavenly bodies fresh in today.” Aisha nodded, letting herself be led to her table while Jon listed all the bizarre creatures she could eat. Aisha felt a strange sense of déjà vu when she walked into the restaurant, like she’d been there before. Shaking her head to throw off these strange thoughts she was getting, Aisha took her seat at the table Jon had led her to. She shuffled around several times in her chair, feeling how sturdy it was. It would have to be sturdy because when she finished eating, Aisha planned to be as heavy as an elephant.

“Here’s your menu, look over it and see if there is anyone you’d like to eat.” Jon handed Aisha the menu slowly. He’d seen over eager patrons rip it out of his hands in their frenzy to get fed and Although Aisha seemed compliant at the moment, Jon knew better then to expect it to remain the same when the hunger hit her. Jon left the carnivorous Ctarl Ctarl and went back to his post at the front of the door, there would be more hungry characters coming any moment now and he couldn’t let them wait.

Aisha flipped open the menu and stared hard at the long line of names beside pictures. Jon hadn’t been kidding when he said the restaurant had a lot of different pray, Aisha saw creatures on the menu that made her look normal. She studied the rows of pictures, examining the features and small tidbits beside them.

“I’ll have him out in a jiffy,” Bunny said, then turned to leave. But before she walked away, she remembered something important she’d forgotten to mention. “By the way, Cloud’s a little bit of a fighter so if he tries to escape…”

“…I’ll wallop his butt good,” Aisha finished, grinning happily that her assessment was true and cloud was a fighter. Eating smaller, weaker prey was good sometimes, but she liked the strong, never give up, never back down types in her stomach. She watched the Bunny girl go into the kitchen to retrieve cloud for her. While Bunny was rounding up Aisha’s meal, the Ctarl-Ctarl girl started loosening her top so it didn’t burst when she was stuffed full of spiky haired Terran. She knew she’d bloat out like a week old fish in the sun, but she didn’t care. Her metabolism could brake down her meal quickly and leave her as trim as before she came to the restaurant.

Bunny came out of the kitchen carrying a hogtied Cloud on her shoulder. He’d been struggling too much to stay on his plate, so Bunny had to carry him out without the serving dish. She hoped the condition of the meal didn’t discourage Aisha from eating him. Seeing her prey without a plate didn’t affect Aisha’s appetite at all. If anything, seeing her prey in the flesh made Aisha feel even hungrier. She wanted Cloud in her stomach now and nothing short of Hojo was going to stop her.

Bunny placed the still hogtied man on Aisha’s table gently, so not to bruise the meat. Bunny looked at Aisha, who was wiping her saliva off her mouth with the back of her hand. Smiling, Bunny reminded Aisha one more time that Cloud was a fighter and may attack her. Aisha looked at the bunny girl and waved her off. She was a Ctarl-Ctarl; she could handle any male, no matter who they were.

“Come to mama,” Aisha said as she slashed Clouds bindings off, so he could start eating. As Cloud was released, his right arm shoot up towards Aisha’s face, ready to punch his enemy strait on the nose. He wasn’t about to become anyone’s meal.
131211.title: Aisha loves a fighter

1312112.content:
“Feisty aren’t you,” Aisha chuckled, as she lazily dodged the punch that Cloud had sent her way. Cloud grunted in anger and tried to hit Aisha again, but this time, Aisha batted his fist away with her hand.

“As much fun as it sounds to thrash you’re sorry punk ass, I’m particularly hungry so we’ll skip the usually taunting and get down to dinner.” Aisha’s head rushed forward, her mouth open wide enough to engulf her preys head and shoulders in an instant. Before Cloud realized what was going on, Aisha had his whole head in her mouth.
Cloud shouted into the hot, wet dimness that surrounded him, his hands waving back and forth as he tried to dislodge the hungry Ctarl-Ctarl from his head. Aisha’s clawed hands grasped his hips and torso, his thrashing arms were ignored for the moment so Aisha could saver her first taste of the blond Terran. Her tongue slobbered all over Clouds entrapped face, sliding over and around his head, soaking him, coating him in her wet saliva.

Cloud grit his teeth and raised his hands to Aisha’s lips to pull them open, but before he could lock his fingers, Aisha grew bored of tasting him and decided to get the show on the road. Cloud’s head was pushed down s further and with a sudden swallow, he found his head sliding down into her throat. Inside Aisha’s throat, the soft, wet channel engulfed him, clinging tightly to him; the muscles tightened and squeezed him until his shoulder started to join him in the throat.
When Cloud was being stuffed mercilessly into Aisha’s throat, the cat girl was in hog heaven. Her drool ran down his chest, dribbling down onto the table where he was still partially lying on. She loved the taste of his well-toned flesh and she wanted to taste more of it so badly. Another swallow came, causing a liquid sucking sound from her throat working at him down. His chest was inside her throat now, both his arms were pinned uselessly to his sides, leaving him unable to do anything else but struggle.

Cloud’s body was big enough that her throat wasn't a perfect seal around him, some air leaking in each time she gulped, enough that he was going to stay conscious all the way down her throat, which Cloud didn’t know was a good thing or a bad thing. Aisha’s teeth grazed Clouds back as she swallowed him down to the waist, dragging him further into her. His legs kicked about now that he could no longer use his arms, which didn’t help him escape, but did annoy Aisha. She was trying to eat here; it was so distracting watching her prey try to swim out of her gullet.

Grasping him by the calves to end his futile, but distracting movements, Aisha swallowed one more, causing her throat to close over his hands and suddenly her mouth was gripping his rump and groin. The sudden feeling of Aisha’s hot, wet mouth over such a sensitive area made Cloud jolted in the tight confines of Aisha’s throat. Aisha smiled slightly at feeling her prey’s movements inside her and wondered if he might slightly be enjoying the idea that his crotch was in her mouth. Aisha decided to stop any notion he might have that this was going to be sexual and take the rest of him in.

She paused in her swallowing and lifted her head up, pulling him clear of the table and slowly tilting back. Cloud felt his body straightening out, his peddling in open air. By now, his young body was bulging out the tanned throat of his catlike predator. His struggles were slightly visible beneath that soft skin, when it would vibrate. Cloud took deep breathes of the stale air in Aisha’s throat, wondering how the hell he was going to get out of this. It struck him like a bullet then that he might not be escaping from this one. His energy left him and he went limp in Aisha’s throat, he was going to die and nothing was going to stop it.

While Cloud struggled to accept his coming death, Aisha was taking deep breaths from her nose for the final swallow. She looked past her lips at Clouds feet, which had just suddenly stopped kicking. Not aware of the reason or really caring at all, Aisha mustered her strength and started to rapidly swallow. Cloud was washed down her throat with a set of sudden convulsions of the throat. His legs kicked once, twice, and then Aisha’s mouth closed behind them and the tongue swept lightly over both feet before disappearing within the Ctarl-Ctarl. Aisha sighed in satisfaction, while Cloud was dumped into her stomach. The muscular walls closed in around him, massaging the digestive juices into his flesh. As Aisha was patting her stomach, Cloud was losing consciousness and falling into a dreamless sleep. To pass the time until Cloud was completely digested, Aisha glanced at the menu and wondered if she really had room for seconds.

info.brief_description: A café where anybody could be eating and anybody could be eaten.
info.description:
The Menu


Appetizers


Welcome to the Ravénous Café, we serve anyone anybody. Our restaurant has a select clientele of anime, video game, cartoon, comic, movie and television characters, who dine on other characters that we ‘acquire’.

We have all kinds of customers, some male, others female and even a few animals. Everyone loves to eat at the Ravénous Café.

Main courses


Customers enter the restaurant with an uncontrollable hunger, accepting the hunger for our meals without question. After eating, they leave with their experience at our establishment erased from their memories. This helps because sometimes our customers will end up as meals the next time they come to the Ravénous Café.

The meals are often frightened and will not want to be eaten in fear of being digested. However, all meals are returned back to their homes, perfectly fine and with no memory of their experience at our restaurant after they have been completely digested.

Deserts


Our customers are given the option of having their meals shrunken down for them at any time, giving them a quick snack on the go. Just ask for them to be shrunken before they come to the table and our friendly waitress will do it.

We also offer private booths, where customers can do whatever they please with their meals. Remember, what happens in the Ravénous Café, stays in the Ravénous Café. Customers only have to ask their waitress to take them to a private booth, where they can unbirth, anal vore or do anything else they please away from prying eyes.

Once finished their meal, the customers can either have seconds or leave. If they leave, look towards another customer to see how happy they are with their meal.

Staff


Jon Masters- Your greeter, he will welcome you to the restaurant and show you to your table. A slim man with brown eyes and hair, some customers say seeing his trusting smile when they walk through the door sets the mood for the whole meal. He has only worked at the Ravénous Café for a few weeks, but is quickly becoming a member of the family.

Bunny- Your waitress, she will take your order and bring your meal to you from the kitchen strait to your table. Bunny is a cheerful bunny girl, with green eyes, red hair and a rabbit tail and ears. She will merrily deliver your meal, without complain about the size or crying of the cuisine.

Management- Owns the Ravénous Café, never seen out of their office. No one knows his or her gender, age or race.
